item.description:
UPDATE: Laura couldn't make it so Aram will be organizing

The start time for this meetup is being pushed back as MIT because the museum opens at 10. Meet at 10:30 in the exhibit space just to the left the lobby. I'll be wearing a fedora.

Most of the opening day events are at the MIT museum (265 Massachusetts Ave, Cambridge, MA 02139)
or the new cambridge library(449 Broadway, Cambridge, MA 02138). This is opening day and admission is free to the MIT museum.

I've put together a tentative schedule. Feel free to come and go as you please, I'll try to be at those 3 placed at those times so if you want to come late/ or leave and come back.

10:30 meet in MIT museum lobby.
12:30 Leave museum, walk towards library and maybe get lunch on the way
2:00 Meet in park outside library entrance

2nd Shift. If you are a late riser you can meet other late risers in the MIT museum lobby at noon. I can't be in 2 places at once, but late risers can self organize.

It will be a nice day to walk between the 2 sites. There are rumors of a trolley running as well if that suits you better.
http://maps.google.co...

Please visit the WEBSITE and see what piques your interest.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at 10:30 in the exhibit space just to the left the lobby. I'll be wearing a fedora.
item.name: Science Festival at Cambridge
